{"id":722766836,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1655286488,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"30 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/722766836/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n=height.size();\n        int left=0,right=n-1,leftmax=0,rightmax=0;\n        int res=0;\n        while(left<=right)\n        {\n            if(height[left]<=height[right])\n            {\n                if(height[left]>leftmax)\n                    leftmax=height[left];\n                else\n                    res+=leftmax-height[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                if(height[right]>rightmax)\n                    rightmax=height[right];\n                else\n                    res+=rightmax-height[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
